name: Your Call is Important to us
name_original: Your Call is Important to us
description:
Welcome to your new career as an emergency responder!

Using our new streamlined service, you can make a real difference and save lives! You'll be responsible for taking calls from people in need of help, identifying their needs and location and dispatching emergency responders to them. This job is as rewarding as it is fun - but remember, any excess deaths will be noted on your quarterly review. 

Controls: 

  • LMB to press buttons 
  • Hold LMB to drag windows across screen

Credits:

  • Nick Furniss: Design, programming
  • Will Isotta: Design, writing
  • Rebecca Pearce-Davies: Art
  • Louise Crouch: UI
